# gux-dismiss-button

This component is meant for use in other components as a dismiss button.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                      | Default      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------- | ------------ |
| `position` | `position` |             | `"absolute" \| "inherit"` | `'absolute'` |
